name: Portal 404
description:
The game is an endless runner, the scenery moves in the background whilst the player can then move in all directions around all the screen trying to stay in it.

The game is based on traditional festivals around the Latin America.

We chose Festival of the Flowers (Feria de las Flores) from Medellin as the first festival. Here the player can interact with the Silletas (traditional flower arrangement attached to a chair)
